page.title: 10BREAKDANCING
page.content: BREAKDANCING IS A VERY POPULAR DANCE BUT CAN BE DANGEROUS SO PROPER TRAINING IS ADVISED.SOME OF THE MOVEMENTS ARE CALLED "CATERPILLER", "WINDMILL","BACKSPIN","MOONWALK", "TURTLE" AND MANY OTHERS."MOONWALK" IS WHEN YOU STAND STILL AND MOVE YOUR FEET LIKE YOU WERE WALKING ON ICE.AT THE CARNIVAL THERE WAS A BREAKDANCING COMPETITION.THE WINNER OF THE SINGLES WAS 13 YEAR OLD MICHAEL WAXMAN AND THE WINNING TEAM WAS "T.T.FRESH".HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE CAME TO WATCH THE BREAKDANCING.OTHER TEAMS WHICH TOOK PART WERE CALLED "WIZZ" AND "SPARKLES".THE WINNERS AND THE RUNNERS UP BOTH GOT RECORD VOUCHERS AND WERE BRILLIANT.
